title: Default sort by Arrival Date and increase MRN font size

requirements.text: Set default sort order to Arrival Date (Oldest First) when Dashboard page loads, while preserving the existing manual sort control functionality

quotes: Automatically sort by Arrival Date (Oldest First) and keep the ability to manually sort the order
Dashboard is one page and Cases is another page

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays cases sorted by Arrival Date (Oldest First) on initial page load
Users can still manually change the sort order using the existing sort control
Manual sort selections persist during the session

requirements.text: Set default sort order to Arrival Date (Oldest First) when Cases page loads, while preserving the existing manual sort control functionality

quotes: Automatically sort by Arrival Date (Oldest First) and keep the ability to manually sort the order
Dashboard is one page and Cases is another page

acceptanceCriteria: Cases page displays cases sorted by Arrival Date (Oldest First) on initial page load
Users can still manually change the sort order using the existing sort control
Manual sort selections persist during the session

requirements.text: Increase the font size of the MRN (Medical Record Number) field in case cards on the Dashboard page

quotes: Apply to MRN in both the case cards/lists

acceptanceCriteria: MRN text is visibly larger and more prominent in Dashboard case cards
Font size increase is consistent across all case cards
Visual hierarchy remains balanced with other case information

requirements.text: Increase the font size of the MRN (Medical Record Number) field in case list items on the Cases page

quotes: Apply to MRN in both the case cards/lists

acceptanceCriteria: MRN text is visibly larger and more prominent in Cases page list items
Font size increase matches the Dashboard implementation
Visual hierarchy remains balanced with other case information

constraints: Preserve existing manual sort control functionality on both Dashboard and Cases pages
Maintain consistency between Dashboard and Cases page implementations
Do not modify the backend sorting logic or data structures
nonGoals: Modifying other text field sizes besides MRN
Changing the layout or structure of case cards
